## Required Declaration Files
The application always uses all declaration files.  
To reproduce bugs reliably, **all of the following `.sav` files must be attached**:

- `actions.sav`
- `condsourcetypes.sav`
- `condtypes.sav`
- `events.sav`
- `targets.sav`

➡️ **Attach all files to this issue**
